## ChatPopUpProps.panel property

The panel to display and hide when click on the pop up button. By default, the panel will be a [ChatPanel()](./chat-ui-react.chatpanel.md) component with [ChatHeader()](./chat-ui-react.chatheader.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
panel?: JSX.Element;
```
